summary: Make the METAL remix of \"Dovahkiin\", Skyrim\'s them, the music of the menu.
descriptionHtml:
(Sorry for my english, I\'m french xD)

-- UPDATED 1.2 --
Make the sound louder. And added a version with shorter intro.
-----------------------

-- 1000 DL --
1000 ! Thanks you very much for all downloaders and all of you who endorsed my file !
-----------------

Thanks if you download my mod ! \\o/

This mod makes the metal remix of \"Dovahkiin\" song the music of the menu of skyrim.

You can find the music [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UW7EnixZVNI] here (YouTube) [/url]

Thanks to Brandon Strader for make it, and to strikerk for uploading this on YouTube.

If you need another song to making it on menu or an other song to replace, just PM me.

- Hyrul

SEE ALSO MY OTHERs MODs

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22685] Blood and Dark - Hide armor Retexture [/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6292] Morrowind\'s Levelup sound Replacement [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8467] Better and Younger Lydia [/url]
author: Hyrul
